Intelligent Automation in HR Services and Solutions

A report by HfS Research discussing the benefits of Intelligent Automation (IA) in HR services and solutions, highlighting its ability to accelerate service delivery speed and effectiveness through straight-through-processing. The report explores the differences between IA capabilities in services vendors and solutions vendors, with services providers focusing on labor arbitrage benefits and enterprise software companies centering their strategy around cognitive computing.

Key Concepts:

  • Straight-through-processing
  • Labor arbitrage
  • Cognitive computing
  • Algorithms
  • Natural Language Processing
  • As-a-Service Economy
  • OneOffice Paradigm
  • HR Outsourcing
  • Value Drivers
Intelligent Automation HR Services Solutions Automation in HR Artificial Intelligence HR Technology Change Management People Analytics RPO Global Solutions
